summary: The Joker is aided in his Halloween quest to render modern technology useless and take over Gotham City by Solomon Grundy, Silver Banshee, Clayface and Scarecrow.
cast: Troy Baker|Eric Bauza|Steve Blum|Janell Cox|Brian T. Delaney|Chris Diamantopoulos|Alastair Duncan|Richard Epcar|Noel Fisher|Will Friedle|Yuri Lowenthal|Dave B. Mitchell|Khary Payton|Roger Craig Smith|Fred Tatasciore|Amanda Troop|Kari Wuhrer|Cedric Yarbrough
keywords: the letter g|nightwing character|supervillainess|green arrow character|long haired female
title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
